title: Landing Page

sub_fields.label: Duplo
sub_fields.name: duplo
sub_fields.instructions: Choose either Relationship, for existing an existing post or taxonomy, or Custom, to create an original block.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: hl_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the background color for highlights section.

sub_fields.label: Highlight
sub_fields.name: highlight
sub_fields.instructions: Please generate these in even groups of 2, 4, or 6.

sub_fields.label: Link
sub_fields.name: hl_link
sub_fields.instructions: This will be triggered when the user clicks on the link or the icon.

sub_fields.label: Connection Options
sub_fields.name: connection_options
sub_fields.instructions: Add either an invitation to follow on social media or sign-up for newsletter via a link.

sub_fields.label: Social Lead
sub_fields.name: social_lead
sub_fields.instructions: Invitation to follow on social media.

sub_fields.label: Gallery
sub_fields.name: ch_gallery
sub_fields.instructions: Please make sure that images are in groups of 6, 9, or 12 in order to make the layouts work.

description: Flexible content area for Landing Pages
